allow: Bash(# Check git to see if these components existed before or were always missing git log --oneline --all -- ""src/features/ocr/components/*"")
Bash(# Kill the old server process, start the new one kill 683477 ; sleep 2 NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js & sleep 5 curl -sf http://localhost:3001/api/system/version)

Bash(# Check best-bet backup for certificates directory with PDFs/templates find /var/www/orthodoxmetrics/2-7-26-best-bet/server -path ''*/certificates/*'' -name ''*.pdf'' -o -path ''*/certificates/*'' -name ''*.png'' -o -path ''*/templates/*'' -name ''*.png'' -o -path ''*/templates/*'' -name ''*.pdf'')
Bash(# Check if template/cert files are in the zip archives unzip -l /var/www/orthodoxmetrics/main.zip)
Bash(# Check best-bet backup for the certificates directory structure find /var/www/orthodoxmetrics/2-7-26-best-bet/server -path ''*/certificates*'' -type f)
Bash(# Check the zip backups - these were created Feb 2, might have the files unzip -l /var/www/orthodoxmetrics/dev.zip)
Bash(# Search more broadly for the actual template PNG/PDF files across all zips unzip -l /var/www/orthodoxmetrics/main.zip)

Bash(# Check /home/next for any certificate template files find /home/next -name ''*adult-baptism*'' -o -name ''*certificate-baptism*'' -o -name ''*certificate-marriage*'' -o -name ''*marriage_certificate_template*'' -o -name ''*baptism_certificate_template*'')
Bash(# Check on github remote for these files - see all branches git branch -r)

Bash(# Let me check if these files were in the old repo structure before it was moved # The 2-7-26-best-bet might have them find /var/www/orthodoxmetrics/2-7-26-best-bet -name ''*.png'' -path ''*/server/*'')
Bash(# Check for any matching template images in home find /home/next -maxdepth 3 -name ''*.png'' -path ''*certif*'' -o -name ''*.png'' -path ''*baptism*'' -o -name ''*.png'' -path ''*marriage*'')
Bash(# Check if the stash had any untracked files for certificates git show stash@{0}^3 --stat)
